radio.title: Radio
radio.subtitle: Radio button component for selecting one value from a group of options with support for grouping and customization

argTypes.modelValue: Selected radio button value (must match value of selected option)
argTypes.disabled: Disables radio button, making it unavailable for interaction
argTypes.size: Radio button size: sm (small), normal (default), lg (large)
argTypes.label: Text label displayed next to radio button
argTypes.value: Radio button value that is set to modelValue when selected
argTypes.variant: Radio button style variant: outlined (with border) or filled (filled)
argTypes.name: Name attribute for input element (used for grouping in RadioGroup)
argTypes.id: Unique element identifier (generated automatically if not specified)
argTypes.ariaLabel: ARIA label for accessibility (alternative to label for screen readers)
argTypes.ariaLabelledby: ID of element that serves as label for radio button (ARIA)
argTypes.focus: Event fired when radio button receives focus
argTypes.blur: Event fired when radio button loses focus
argTypes.change: Event fired when selected option changes
argTypes.icon: Slot for custom radio button icon

basic.title: Basic Example
basic.description: Standard radio buttons in basic state. For radio buttons to work, they must be linked via a common `v-model` or use the `CRadioGroup` component

filled.title: Filled Style
filled.description: Radio button with filled background instead of standard outline. Set by `variant="filled"` property

size.title: Size
size.description: Radio button size is controlled by the `size` property. Available values: `sm` (small), `lg` (large). Medium size is used by default

disabled.title: Disabled State
disabled.description: Radio button in inactive state, unavailable for interaction. Set by `disabled` property

invalid.title: Error State
invalid.description: Radio button in error state with red border. Activated by `invalid` property. Used to display validation errors in forms

group.title: Radio Group
group.description: `CRadioGroup` component for managing multiple radio buttons. Supports horizontal and vertical orientation via `orientation` property. Value is the selected option from the group

customIcon.title: Custom Icon
customIcon.description: Radio button with custom icon instead of standard dot. Icon is configured through `icon` slot, which receives `checked` and `iconClass` parameters

customLabel.title: Custom Label
customLabel.description: Radio button with custom label content via `default` slot. Allows using HTML markup, icons or other components instead of plain text

form.title: In Form
form.description: Integration with `CFormItem`: validation of radio button group, displaying error message
